document_data.name: Blodhlar's Wares
document_data.mainbody: 'Blodhlar's Wares''' was a hardware store in [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]]. It sold [[nail]]s, [[rope]]s, gate [[hinge]]s, and other assorted pieces of hardware. The general state of the building was poor.
